title.rendered: Kiosk Kaffee opens it’s 10th outlet in Pune, at The Mills, Pune.

content.rendered: Kiosk Kaffee was founded in December 2020 after which the chain has spread across the city. The main agenda behind all this hard work is to make coffee affordable to common man.

excerpt.rendered: Kiosk Kaffee was founded in December 2020 after which the chain has spread across the city. The main agenda behind all this hard work is to make coffee affordable to common man.
